publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1631.1 Tommy Sheridan: Increased Water Charges—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1631) in the name of Mr Brian Monteith, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Executive to bring forward proposals for a wide-ranging and comprehensive scheme that goes beyond the inadequate proposals already announced and returns the water industry to full democratic control and management via joint boards involving workers and elected councillors with the ability to borrow sufficient amounts of money over longer periods of time to deliver significant improvements in our infrastructure without penalising Scotland’s citizens."
